Available Robonomist Datasources, retrieved on `r Sys.Date()`.

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path = "man/figures/",
  comment = "#>",
  cache = TRUE
)
library(robonomistClient)
options("roboplot.caption.template" = "Source: {text}")
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
datasources() |>
  select(Title = title, Languages = languages, `Dataset ID` = dataset) |>
  arrange(Title) |>
  roboplotr::robotable(
    title = "Robonomist Datasources",
    caption = paste("Robonomist Data Server, retrieved on", Sys.Date()),
    pagelength = 100,
    class = c("row-border", "hover"),
    responsive = "Languages",
    sortable = FALSE
  )
```
